00048 void HelpUser( void ) {
00049   writeln( "Usage: amateur SNAPSHOTID{1..?} [xamshzt]");
00050   writeln( "where SNAPSHOT is an integer between 1 and 14");
00051   writeln( "-a runs AMIGA's subhalo finder AHFstep");
00052   writeln( "-m runs AMIGA's subhalo <=> halo identifier MergerTree");
00053   writeln( "-o extracts relevant results from AHF output");
00054   writeln( "-s matches subhalos to their host halo");
00055   writeln( "-h runs AMIGA's HaloTracker (experimental)");
00056   writeln( "-t computes the tidal field of the given snapshot at 10 smoothing scales");
00057   writeln( "-x extracts information to a HDF5 file");
00058   writeln( "-z analyses the snapshot file, using AMIGA's subhalos" );
00059   writeln( "-T test runs for debugging purposes" );
00060   writeln( "default: runs successively x, a, o, m, s, (h), z, t" );
00061   for(int i=0; i<18; ++i)
00062     std::cout << "  " << i+1 << " " << Snaps(i) << std::endl;
00063   std::cout << std::endl;
00064   //printMinMaxValues();
00065 }
00066 
00077 int main ( int argc, char *argv[ ] ) {
00078 
00079   //int setpriority(int which, id_t who (0 = this process), int nice);"
00080   setpriority(PRIO_PROCESS, 0, 0);//15);
00081   writeln("");
00082   writeln( "AMATEUR by Pascal Steger,    psteger@phys.ethz.ch");
00083   writeln( "=================================================");
00084   writeln( "");
00085   if ( argc <= 1 || argc > 3 ) {
00086     HelpUser();
00087     return 0;
00088   }
00089   Array3 A(512,512,512);
00090   ScalarField S(512,512,512,0.3,3);
00091   PoissonSolver<3> ps(&S,&S);
00092 
00093   int isnap = atoi( argv[ 1 ] ) - 1;
00094   std::cout << "    Looking at snapshot " << Snaps( isnap ) << "." << std::endl;
00095 
00096   for ( int i = 0; i < 1; ++i ) {
00097     // std::cout << "commandline argument nr. " << i << std::endl;
00098     char c = getopt( argc, argv, "aomshtTxz" );
00099     switch ( c ) {
00100     case 'a':
00101       writeln(" Running AMIGA's AHFstep on snapshot file...");
00102       AHFrun( isnap );
00103       break;
00104     
00105     case 'o':
00106       writeln(" Extracting interesting output columns from AHF output...");
00107       AOutput( isnap );
00108       break;
00109 
00110     case 'm':
00111       writeln(" Searching halo/subhalo-relations with OwnMergerTree...");
00112       MergerTreeRun( isnap );
00113       break;
00114 
00115     case 's':
00116       writeln(" Matching subhalos to their host..." );
00117       SubhaloMatch( isnap );
00118       break;
00119 
00120     case 'h':
00121       writeln(" Running HaloTracker...");
00122       //HaloTrackerRun( isnap );
00123       break;
00124 
00125     case 't':
00126       writeln( " Computing tidal field..." );
00127       //std::cout << "Enter N for N^3 sample points: ";
00128       //int N;
00129       //std::cin >> N;
00130       //TidalField(isnap, N, 500.0);
00131       TidalField( isnap, 512, 500.0 );
00132       break;
00133 
00134     case 'x':
00135       writeln( " Extracting GADGET2 binary to HDF5..." );
00136       ExtractSnap( isnap );
00137       break;
00138 
00139     case 'z':
00140       writeln( " Analyzing snapshot file with AHF Halos..." );
00141       AnalyzeSnap( isnap );
00142       break;
00143 
00144     case 'T':
00145       writeln( " Running test routines..." );
00146       writeln( " starting with setting values in A..." );
00147       for(int i=0; i<512; ++i){
00148     A.setValue(i,i,i,0.1*i);
00149     std::cout << A.getValue(i,i,i);
00150       }
00151       cout << endl;
00152       for(int i=0; i<512; ++i){
00153     A.setValue(i,i,i,0.1*i);
00154     std::cout << A.getValue(i,i,i);
00155       }
00156       cout << endl;
00157 
00158       writeln( " now for ScalarField...");
00159       for(int i=0; i<512; ++i){
00160     S.setValue(i,i,i,i/1.0);
00161     cout << S.getValue(i,i,i) << " ";
00162       }
00163       cout << endl;
00164 
00165       writeln( " test routine from ScalarField..." );
00166       S.test();
00167 
00168       writeln( " test routine from PoissonSolver..." );
00169       ps.test();
00170       for(int i=0; i<512; ++i){
00171     cout << S.getValue(i,i,i) << " ";
00172       }
00173       break;
00174 
00175     default:
00176       writeln( " Default: Extracting GADGET2 binary to HDF5..." );
00177       ExtractSnap( isnap );
00178       writeln( " Running AMIGA's AHFstep on snapshot file..." );
00179       AHFrun( isnap );
00180       writeln( " Extracting interesting output columns from AHF output...");
00181       AOutput( isnap );
00182       writeln( " Searching halo/subhalo-relations with OwnMergerTree..." );
00183       MergerTreeRun( isnap );
00184       writeln( " Matching subhalos to their host..." );
00185       SubhaloMatch( isnap );
00186       writeln( " Running HaloTracker...");
00187       // HaloTrackerRun(isnap);
00188       writeln( " Analyzing snapshot file with Halo..." );
00189       AnalyzeSnap( isnap );
00190       writeln( " Computing tidal field..." );
00191       TidalField( isnap, 512, 500.0 );
00192     }
00193   }
00194   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00195 }
